              </option>
              <option value="united-kingdom">
               United Kingdom
              </option>
              <option value="united-states">
               United States
              </option>
              <option value="united-states-minor-outlying-islands">
               United States Minor Outlying Islands
              </option>
              <option value="uruguay">
               Uruguay
              </option>
              <option value="uzbekistan">
               Uzbekistan
              </option>
              <option value="vanuatu">
               Vanuatu
              </option>
              <option value="venezuela">
               Venezuela
              </option>
              <option value="vietnam">
               Vietnam
              </option>
              <option value="virgin-islands-british">
               Virgin Islands -  British
              </option>
              <option value="virgin-islands-u.s">
               Virgin Islands U.S.
              </option>
              <option value="wallis-futuna">
               Wallis Futuna
              </option>
              <option value="western-sahara">
               Western Sahara
              </option>
              <option value="yemen">
               Yemen
              </option>
              <option value="zambia">
               Zambia
              </option>
              <option value="zanzibar">
               Zanzibar
              </option>
              <option value="zimbabwe">
               Zimbabwe
              </option>
             </select>
             <p class="select-error">
              Please select a Country
             </p>
            </div>
           </div>
           <div class="btn-center">
            <button class="btn btn-lg btn-orange" id="order-visa-now">
             Get Started
             <span class="glyphicon glyphicon-chevron-right">
             </span>
            </button>
           </div>
          </fieldset>
         </form>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </section>
    <section class="companies-section lp2 caret-bottom white">
     <div class="container">

    </section>
    <div class="scrollspy-block" id="17">
     <section class="benefits-section caret-bottom grey">
      <div class="container">
       <h2 class="section-title">
        Why Choose
        <span class="bold">
         Passports
        </span>
        and
        <span class="bold">
         Visas.com
        </span>
       </h2>
       <div class="row">
        <div class="col-lg-12">
         <div class="row">
          <div class="col-sm-6">
           <div class="benefit">
            <p class="title">
             <img alt="image description" src="/assets/images/v2/benefit-1.png"/>
             WHITE GLOVE CONCIERGE SERVICE
            </p>
            <p>
             Your personal account manager will guide you through the entire application process. No calls centers to deal with. Just friendly, professionals dedicated to you and your travel needs.
            </p>
           </div>
          </div>
          <div class="col-sm-6">
           <div class="benefit">
            <p class="title">
             <img alt="image description" src="/assets/images/v2/benefit-2.png"/>
             FAST, GOVERNMENT APPROVED SERVICES
            </p>
            <p>
             We work with the United States Passport Agency to obtain your US passport application in as little as 24 hours. View instructions on all of our expediting passport application services, including passport renewal, new passport applications and to replace a lost passport. There simply isnâ€™t a better way to get a passport fast.
            </p>
           </div>
          </div>
          <div class="clearfix hidden-xs sep">
          </div>
          <div class="col-sm-6">
           <div class="benefit">
            <p class="title">
             <img alt="image description" src="/assets/images/v2/benefit-3.png"/>
             Trusted Passport and Visa Services
            </p>
            <p>
             We are a nationally recognized US passport and travel visa service by the Washington Post , New York Times and USA Today and ranked #1 by the US Passport Service Guide in a survey of 40 expediting services. Our team of US passport and visa expeditors have been obtaining rush passports and visas for over 15 years.
            </p>
           </div>
          </div>
          <div class="col-sm-6">
           <div class="benefit">
            <p class="title">
             <img alt="image description" src="/assets/images/v2/benefit-4.png"/>
             SAFE and secure processing with status updates
            </p>
            <p>
             You can get the status of your US passport application online 24/7. You'll receive email updates as your passport application process is expedited - with the final email alerting you that your US passport application has been completed. Rest assured - if a problem with your US passport application arises - you'll get the information fast.
            </p>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </section>
    </div>
    <section class="regions-section caret-bottom dark-grey">
     <div class="container">
      <h2 class="section-title">
       10 Regional Offices Around the Country
      </h2>
      <p>
       For personal assistance with your passport or visa application, come visit one of our 10 convenient locations across the United States.
      </p>
      <div class="map-holder">
       <img alt="" height="549" src="/assets/images/v2/map.png" usemap="#usa" width="1170"/>
       <map id="usa" name="usa">

        </area>
        <area alt="Denver" coords="460,221,657,260" href="https://www.passportsandvisas.com/office/denver-passport" shape="rect" style="outline:none;" target="_self" title="Denver">
        </area>

        </area>
        <area alt="New York" coords="899,148,1137,184" href="https://www.passportsandvisas.com/office/new-york" shape="rect" style="outline:none;" target="_self" title="New York">
        </area>
        <area alt="Boston" coords="937,99,1139,135" href="https://www.passportsandvisas.com/office/boston-visa-passport-service" shape="rect" style="outline:none;" target="_self" title="Boston">
        </area>
       </map>
      </div>
     </div>
    </section>
    <section class="benefits-section about-section caret-bottom grey">
     <div class="container">
      <h2 class="section-title">
       How Our
       <span class="bold">
        Expedited Services Work
       </span>
      </h2>
      <div class="row">
       <div class="col-lg-12">
        <div class="row">
         <div class="col-sm-6">
          <div class="benefit">
           <strong class="title">
            WATCH OUR VIDEO TO SEE HOW EASY IT IS TO GET YOUR TRAVEL DOCUMENTS EXPEDITED.
           </strong>
           <p>
            Are you facing a travel date only to find that youâ€™re without a passport or your old passport has expired? Donâ€™t worry, even if you are traveling tomorrow, we can help. Our 24 hour passport and travel visa service makes certain that your plane, car, or ship doesnâ€™t leave without you.
           </p>
           <p>
            20 years of timely, secure, and accurate passport and visa expediting services to over half a million travelers has earned
            <strong>
             Passports and Visas.com the Number 1 ranking by the US Passport Service Guide
            </strong>
            .
           </p>
          </div>
         </div>
         <div class="col-sm-6">
          <div class="benefit">

       <div class="row">

           <strong class="title">

           </strong>

           </p>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="visible-sm clearfix">

           <strong class="title">
            APPLICATION PROCESSING
           </strong>
           <p>
            Our team reviews and submits your documents while your Account Manager keeps you informed throughout the entire process.
           </p>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
        <div class="col-md-3 col-sm-6">
         <div class="step">

          </div>

           <strong class="title">

           </strong>
           <p>
            Your Passport / Travel Visa is
                 delivered via secure Fedex service.
           </p>

    <section class="stories-section caret-bottom dark-green">
     <div class="container">
      <h2 class="section-title">
       Tips For Traveling Smarter
      </h2>
      <div class="row">
       <div class="col-sm-4">
        <div class="testimonial equal">
         <div class="story-image">
          <img alt="" class="thumb" height="186" src="//cdn-static.passportsandvisas.com/images/made/images/remote/https_cdn-static.passportsandvisas.com/general/passport4-header_310_186_c1.jpg" width="310"/>
         </div>
         <h3 class="story-heading">
          <a href="/resource-center/budgeting-for-international-travel">
           Budgeting For International Travel
          </a>
         </h3>
         <div class="story-text">
          You can travel internationally for leisure, recreation, business, or visits with family and friends. The amazing life experiences that come with travel have a price tag to consider though. Budgeting for international travel means addressingâ€¦
         </div>
         <a class="read-more" href="/resource-center/budgeting-for-international-travel">
          Read More
         </a>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="col-sm-4">
        <div class="testimonial equal">
         <div class="story-image">
          <img alt="" class="thumb" height="186" src="//cdn-static.passportsandvisas.com/images/made/images/remote/https_cdn-static.passportsandvisas.com/general/passport3-header_310_186_c1.jpg" width="310"/>
         </div>
         <h3 class="story-heading">
          <a href="/resource-center/how-to-complete-your-passport-application">
           How To Complete Your Passport Application
          </a>
         </h3>
         <div class="story-text">
          Passport application forms are the first step in receiving undeniable identification to travel abroad. Because a passport proves not only who you are, but what country you are legally from, your request for documentation must be completedâ€¦
         </div>
         <a class="read-more" href="/resource-center/how-to-complete-your-passport-application">
          Read More
         </a>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div class="col-sm-4">
        <div class="testimonial equal">
         <div class="story-image">
          <img alt="" class="thumb" height="186" src="//cdn-static.passportsandvisas.com/images/made/images/remote/https_cdn-static.passportsandvisas.com/general/international-travel-for-smb_310_186_c1.jpg" width="310"/>
         </div>
         <h3 class="story-heading">
          <a href="/resource-center/international-travel-for-smbs">
           International travel for SMBs
          </a>
         </h3>
         <div class="story-text">
          The small business or start-up may not have a travel department or a manager dedicated to helping them plan international business travel. In spite of this, all sizes and types of companies can develop policies and adopt strategies to helpâ€¦
         </div>
         <a class="read-more" href="/resource-center/international-travel-for-smbs">
          Read More
         </a>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>

   <script type="application/ld+json">

       "bestRating": "10",
       "worstRating": "1",
       "ratingCount": " 8849 "
     }
   }
   </script>

   </script>
   <!-- order processing start -->
   <script src="/assets/js/_common.min.js?v=20171231101344">
   </script>
   <script src="/assets/js/_variables.min.js?v=20171226083441">
   </script>
   <script src="/assets/js/_cart.min.js?v=20171231101348">
   </script>
   <script src="/assets/js/main_ini.min.js?v=20171231101352">
   </script>
   <script src="/assets/js/3thparty.min.js?v=20161116021833">
   </script>
   <script src="/assets/libs/js/jquery.PageScroll2id.min.js">
   </script>
   <script src="//solutions.invocacdn.com/js/pnapi_integration-latest.min.js" type="text/javascript">
   </script>
   <script type="text/javascript">
    //Grab Google Analytics Visitor ID
     function getClientId() {
       // If ga is defined, check for the clientId and return it
       if (typeof ga !== 'undefined' && typeof ga.getAll === 'function') {
 
         var clientId = ga.getAll()[0].get('clientId');
         return clientId;
         // otherwise, return false so waitFor knows to try again for defined wait time
       } else {
         return false;
       }
     }
 
     //Invoca Tracking Number Call
     function callInvoca(cid){
       //Segment out organic vs direct traffic
       var invocaOrganicCampaign = (document.referrer.length > 0) ? "organic" : "direct";
       //Look in the Invoca cookie first then fallback for org/dir segmentation
       var campaign = Invoca.Tools.readInvocaData("fallbackCampaign", invocaOrganicCampaign);
       //Look in the Invoca cookie for a referrer or pull in document.referrer
       var referrerDomain = Invoca.Tools.readInvocaData("referrer", document.referrer);
       //Save parameters for reporting
       var invocaParams = {
         referrer: referrerDomain,
         fallbackCampaign: campaign,
         g_cid: cid
       };
       //Invoca Number Replacement Settings
       Invoca.PNAPI.integration({
         networkId: 1071, //Static, do not change
         numberSelector: ".promoNumber", //Insert your CSS class selector here
         campaignIdOverrideParam: "cid", //Query string parameter to map Invoca Campaigns
         defaultCampaignId: campaign, //Designates fallback campaign if "cid" query string parameter is not present
         poolParams: invocaParams //Custom ringpool parameters in Invoca reporting
       });
     }
     //Runs Invoca Code
     Invoca.Tools.waitFor(getClientId, callInvoca, 'noCid', 1000); //1000 is user-defined max wait time in MS
   </script>
  </body>
 </html>
